text: 4.11 1 Ko 3.10, 10.31, Epe 5.20, 1 Pi 5.11, Lep 1.6 Binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek takaw agñɨnɨg, God takaw ne yɨbɨl nep agñɨnɨmuŋ. Binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, tap malɨk gɨl gɨñɨnɨg, God kɨles ne anɨb ak dɨl malɨk gɨl gɨñɨnɨmuŋ. Anɨb okok mɨdupsek anɨgem, binɨb ogɨnap nɨbi Jisas Klays nop gos nɨŋɨd anɨgebɨm ak nɨŋɨd, God nop yɨb awl ñɨnɨgabal. Yɨb nop pel pelnep dad aplaneb, kɨles ne tap okok mɨdupsek pel kod mɨdeb. Yaw.
